dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints. Corrections & additions, October 1944. Reprinted by Survey of Israel, April 1950. "The routes shown in red have been traced from the itineraries of pilgrims & travellers of the Crusading Period. The forest areas are based principally on the Palestine Exploration Fund Map of 1878." Includes inset map: Kingdom of Jerusalem.
